input: Batch request to update multiple fields on two different prenote entries and retrieve the updated details.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

PATCH /BankAccountPrenoteEntries/88888888-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01/99999999-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"Note": "Revised Note", "AdditionalNote": "Quick Update"}

GET /BankAccountPrenoteEntries/88888888-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01/99999999-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01 HTTP/1.1

PATCH /BankAccountPrenoteEntries/11111111-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01/22222222-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"MaterialCheckNote": "Completed", "ValidityEndDate": "2026-01-01"}

GET /BankAccountPrenoteEntries/11111111-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01/22222222-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01 HTTP/1.1

--request-separator--
